The laws must receive the President's approval and be recorded in the Federal Register.

question.title: Will the US Congress pass both a national popular vote and federal incentives for electric vehicles legislation before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following occur: (1) The US Congress passes legislation to establish a national popular vote for presidential elections at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The legislation must be signed into law by the President and its passage confirmed by official congressional records and reputable news sources. (2) The US Congress passes legislation providing federal incentives for electric vehicle production between the creation date of this question and January 1, 2028. The legislation must be signed by the President and published in the Federal Register.

not_P.title: Will the US Congress not pass both a national popular vote and federal incentives for electric vehicles legislation before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if either of the following occurs: (1) The US Congress does not pass legislation to establish a national popular vote for presidential elections at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The legislation must be signed into law by the President and its passage confirmed by official congressional records and reputable news sources. (2) The US Congress does not pass legislation providing federal incentives for electric vehicle production between the creation date of this question and January 1, 2028. The legislation must be signed by the President and published in the Federal Register.

para_P.title: Will both a national popular vote and federal support for electric vehicle legislation be approved by the US Congress before January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered 'Yes' if the following two conditions are met: (1) The US Congress enacts a law to implement a national popular vote for presidential elections at any time from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. The law must receive the President's signature and its passage must be verified by official congressional records and credible news outlets. (2) The US Congress passes a law that offers federal incentives for the production of electric vehicles between the date this question is created and January 1, 2028. This law must also be signed by the President and published in the Federal Register.

question.title: Will a new chemical process for carbon capture and storage be commercially deployed before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if a new chemical process for carbon capture and storage (CCS) is commercially deployed between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The deployment must be documented in industry reports or verified by independent experts, and the process must be operational at a commercial scale, not just in pilot or experimental stages.

not_P.title: Will a new chemical process for carbon capture and storage not be commercially deployed before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if a new chemical process for carbon capture and storage (CCS) is not commercially deployed between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The deployment must not be documented in industry reports or verified by independent experts, and the process must not be operational at a commercial scale, not just in pilot or experimental stages.

para_P.title: Is it possible for a novel chemical method for capturing and storing carbon to be put into commercial use prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if a novel chemical method for carbon capture and storage (CCS) is put into commercial use between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The implementation must be recorded in industry publications or confirmed by independent authorities, and the method must be functioning at a commercial scale, rather than merely in trial or experimental phases.

para_P.title: Is it possible that the European Medicines Agency will authorize a novel pharmacological therapy for Alzheimer's disease prior to January 1, 2028?

not_P.title: Will the United Kingdom not hold a general election before January 1, 2028?

para_P.title: Is it possible that NATO will place nuclear arms in a member nation for the first occasion since 2024 prior to January 1, 2028?

question.title: Will China achieve net positive energy output from a nuclear fusion reactor before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, a nuclear fusion reactor in China achieves net positive energy output, meaning the reactor produces more energy than it consumes. The achievement must be verified by a reputable scientific organization or governmental body.

not_P.title: Will China not achieve net positive energy output from a nuclear fusion reactor before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, a nuclear fusion reactor in China does not achieve net positive energy output, meaning the reactor does not produce more energy than it consumes. The lack of achievement must be verified by a reputable scientific organization or governmental body.

para_P.title: Will China reach a state of producing more energy than it uses from a nuclear fusion reactor prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if, during the period from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, a nuclear fusion reactor in China generates more energy than it consumes, indicating a net positive energy output. This accomplishment must be confirmed by a credible scientific institution or government agency.

question.title: Will Australia or Norway hold a referendum on any national issue before January 1, 2028?

question.title: Will Russia officially withdraw from the Paris Agreement before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Russia officially notifies the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement and completes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028. The withdrawal must be confirmed by official UNFCCC documentation.

not_P.title: Will Russia not officially withdraw from the Paris Agreement before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Russia does not officially notify the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement or fails to complete the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028. The withdrawal must not be confirmed by official UNFCCC documentation.

para_P.title: Is it expected that Russia will formally exit the Paris Agreement prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if Russia formally informs the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its decision to exit the Paris Agreement and finalizes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028. Official documentation from the UNFCCC must confirm the withdrawal.

not_P.title: Will neither Australia nor Norway hold a referendum on any national issue and will Russia not officially withdraw from the Paris Agreement before January 1, 2028?

para_P.title: Will either Australia or Norway conduct a national referendum and will Russia formally exit the Paris Agreement prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed 'Yes' if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (1) Either Australia or Norway conducts a national referendum on any subject between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, with the referendum being officially acknowledged and its outcomes documented by the relevant national electoral authority. (2) Russia officially informs the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its decision to withdraw from the Paris Agreement and finalizes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028, with the withdrawal validated by official documentation from the UNFCCC.
